toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When checked, when a Qty Complete booking is made, a labor transaction will occur. If labor type is Per Piece, it will use the Std Hours x Qty Complete x Rate. If Per Batch, it will use a prorated labor amount (Std Hours/WO Qty) x Qty Complete x Rate.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Backflush Labor at Qty Complete
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__rtroutoper_labbackflush__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: When Backflush Labor at Qty Complete is checked, when a Mfg User is selected here, it will be this user & Employee Rate that will be used on the "backflush" labor transaction. If left blank, transaction will use the login user & their Employee Rate.
